long_description: The SmartWool PhD Compression Calf sleeves help improve overall recovery. Recovery-enhancing compression improves blood flow; oxygenated blood and nutrients return to muscles faster to help muscles rebuild and repair. 20-30 mmHg graduated compression. Mesh ventilation zones manage temperature and moisture. 1x1 rib-knit legs. SmartWool PhD compression sleeves feature innovative fabric, a comfortable fit and smart design details that enhance performance. ReliaWool is a patent-pending reinforcement construction that puts more wool in high wear/high impact areas to increase durability and comfort. Performance-enhancing merino wool helps your body maintain a stable core body temperature minimizing lactic acid build-up. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The SmartWool PhD Compression Calf sleeves help improve overall recovery.
